name: node-layout-switcher

scripts.test:full: npm run test:conversion && npm run test:dictionaries && npm run test:integration
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run build
scripts.precommit: npm run check && npm run test:full
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: koenigstag
description: A Node.js utility for automatic keyboard layout switching and text conversion between different languages and layouts (QWERTY, DVORAK). Supports English, Russian, Ukrainian, German, French, and Czech layouts with hotkey-based text replacement.
